title: Descent Collection (includes I, II, II Vertigo, 3, and 3 Mercena
description:
This is a compilation of all of the descent games (or at least all the one's I know about).

This archive should contain the following main folders:
Descent I (Standalone)
Descent II (Standalone)
Descent 3 (Dual Jewel Version)
Descent I & II - The Definitive Collection
Extras

All images and files were downloaded from the net with the exception of the Descent II Standalone and Descent 3/Descent 3 Mercenary images, which are rips of my personal copies.  The expansions can be found within subfolders of the games they apply to.

Please check out the Extras folder as well, as it contains programs that will help in getting descent working on modern systems as well as nifty and somewhat rare Descent related stuff including mods, photos, demos, etc.






This torrent has been brought to you by Infinity_The_Impaler.  I will try to seed this as much as possible, but I can't be on the internet all of the time :-P.  If you aren't getting any seeds, keep your client up and It'll eventually pick up again .
